page.title: 18HERTFORD COMMUTER STATIONS
page.content: There are two railway stations in{ {HERTFORD}but only one ({HERTFORD EAST} )is in our area.This is the end of a line which runs through{WARE,HODDESDON {,TOTTENHAM}to{LIVERPOOL STREET STATION {LONDON.}Although{HERTFORD NORTH}is more popular because it is electrified and quicker{HERTFORD EAST}is used by commuters.Many people travel to{LONDON to work in the offices and industries there.They live in{HERTFORD}because they prefer to live in the more pleasant environment of a small town rather than{LONDON.}Those that do not travel by train used the{A10}which passes through our block or the{A1,}6 miles to the west.
